title: The Major General’s Wife is Super Rich - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Betrayal   Calm Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Revenge   Second Chance
author: 浅绿清风
description:
Arranged marriage, betrayed family, stifled dreams ......

In his last life, Li Xin had been trapped in suffocation and anger, until the moment before he died, when he saw the goodness that man had hidden for him underneath his indifferent attitude.

He will never trap himself in place nor be foolishly used again.

That man's goodness, he would not fail it again!

'Major General, madam has brought you dinner!'

'Major General, Madam has invited you to try out the new products!'

'Major General, Madam has contracted out the base's cafeteria ......'

'Madam, isn't this ...... too much?' The assistant's expression was aggrieved, the tone even more so, eyes blinking so hard he wanted to cry.

'How is it too much? Isn't it only natural for me to be nice to my own partner?'>
